channel.title: [508] help with command
channel.description:
ok so on my Z508 source based client when i make someone an admin their combat level goes to 0, i need
help to make it the regular 126 or 138 because they cannot fight regular people...
it is very annoying because admins can only fight admins and i only have a few admins who aren't on all the
time
HELP ME PLEASE

item.title: [508] help with command
item.dc:creator: @Owned_Pl0xs Owned_Pl0xs
item.description:
@Owned_Pl0xs wrote:

Go to the PlayerUpdateMasks class, and you will find:

if (p.rights >= 2) { combat = 0; }

Delete it.

Read full topic

item.title: [508] help with command
item.dc:creator: @cj_howat cj_howat@hotmail.com
item.description:
@cj_howat wrote:

Ok well for the first thing, the person who created z508 didn’t want admins to have an unfair advantage so if you want to pk , just make a pure on your server,

Read full topic
